productEmsList.title: Band type
productEmsList.tooltip:
The stretchy band is recommended for kids, ages 4-7. The band stretches to comfortably fit a wrist 147 mm in circumference.

The adjustable band with a buckle is recommended for kids, 4 and older. The band fits wrists measuring 130-175 mm in circumference.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: Help your child stay active with the vívofit® jr. 2 Disney Princess fitness tracker which includes an interactive app where activity unlocks adventure.
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: vivofit jr, disney princess vivofit, fitness tracker, activity tracker for kids, kids activity tracker
seoAttributes.seoTitle: Garmin vívofit® jr. 2 | Disney Princess Kids Fitness Tracker
seoAttributes.title: vívofit® jr. 2, Princess

seo.ogDescription: Help your child stay active with the vívofit® jr. 2 fitness tracker, which includes a Star Wars BB-8™ theme & an interactive app.
seo.title: Garmin vívofit® jr. 2 | Kids Fitness Tracker | Star Wars

specs.Battery life: Up to 1 year (1 x CR1632 user-replaceable)
specs.Physical size:
Stretchy bands accommodate wrists up to 147 mm (ages 4-7)
Adjustable bands fit 130-175 mm (ages 4+)
vívofit 3, vivofit jr. and vivofit jr. 2 bands are compatible.

seo.ogDescription: The magic is all around when the Disney Minnie Mouse vívofit jr. 2 is on your kid’s wrist. This swim-friendly activity tracker is tough enough to make it through playtime, and with 1+ year battery life, there’s no stopping the action to recharge.
seo.title: Garmin vívofit® jr. 2 | Kids Fitness Tracker | Disney Minnie Mouse
